objects.text:
• Complete Ecosystem Solution
• Retina Display Technology
• Seamless Device Integration
• Premium Aluminum Build

product_details.name: Apple Premium Device Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Package
product_details.description:
• Complete Apple ecosystem solution for seamless integration
• MacBook Pro with Retina Display and backlit keyboard
• Latest generation iPad with stunning display for portable computing
• iPhone featuring advanced camera system and Touch ID
• All devices in pristine silver/white finish
• Perfect for professionals, creators, and Apple enthusiasts
• Synchronized iCloud functionality across all devices
• Premium aluminum build quality across all devices
• Multi-device workflow capability with Handoff feature
• Universal Clipboard and AirDrop for seamless file sharing
• Latest operating systems pre-installed
• Perfect for both work and entertainment

banner_details:
This banner features a promotional layout for a premium tech bundle. The left side is dominated by a bold, two-line headline using text layers "heading_1" and "heading_2", with a clean sans-serif font in dark charcoal color for strong readability. Below, a smaller tagline styled with "tagline" in uppercase, adds a modern and tech-savvy feel using a bright blue tone. The center showcases the "product_image", emphasizing sleek hardware. A bulleted feature list using "description" outlines core benefits. Price details ("price") in larger font below it highlight value, and a rectangular CTA button comprised of "cta_background" and "cta" calls attention with contrasting blue and white text.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #F5F5F5 (light neutral)
- Blue: #0066CC (for CTA and tagline)
- Gray: #333333 (for headings and text)
- Accent Gray Circles: #D0D0D0, #C0C0C0 (decorative)
- White: #FFFFFF (contained in button text)
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern feel with a harmonious blend of soft and professional tones. The dominant colors come from the devices' metallic silver-gray bodies (#C0C0C0), glossy black screens (#1A1A1A), and reflective surfaces. The MacBook's screen displays a vivid landscape with pastel pink (#D9A9B1), soft blue (#A5C3DC), and sunset orange (#F4A261), adding warmth and vibrancy. These colors contrast yet complement the cool hues of the iPad’s deep space blue (#1D3557) and the iPhone’s grayscale image (#B0B0B0), ensuring clarity and emphasis. This palette combines elegance with technological sophistication, ideal for a sleek advertisement banner.
